text: w'idha 'asab al'insan alshdt astghath bina fi kashf dhlk eanh mdtjeana lijanbih 'aw qaedana 'aw qaymana, ealaa hsb alhal alty yakun biha eind nuzul dhlk aldrr bh. falamaa kashafna eanh alshdt alty 'asabath astmrr ealaa tryqth al'uwlaa qabl 'an ysybh aldr, wanasi ma kan fih min alshdt walbla', wtrk alshukr lirabih aldhy frraj eanh ma kan qad nazal bih min albla', kama zuyin lhdha al'iinsan aistimrarah ealaa jhwdh wenadh baed kashf allah eanh ma kan fih min aldr, zuyin liladhin 'asrafuu fi alkadhib ealaa allah waealaa anbyayh ma kanuu yaemalun min measy allah walshrk bh
